abstract: Sanofi-Aventis investors have urged the drugmaker not to pay more than about $19 billion to land Genzyme, some $10 a share below the price wanted by the American biotech group.
snippet: Sanofi-Aventis investors have urged the drugmaker not to pay more than about $19 billion to land Genzyme, some $10 a share below the price wanted by the American biotech group.
lead_paragraph: Sanofi-Aventis investors have urged the drugmaker not to pay more than about $19 billion to land Genzyme, some $10 a share below the price wanted by the United States biotech group.

headline.main: Sanofi Investors Oppose Big Hike in Genzyme Bid
